nodes.text: Hyperdrive Station A-226 was a technical sector of the Imperial battlestation known as the Death Star. The stations' powerful hyperdrive system was housed in that sector and monitored from there.

The image used to represent Hyperdrive Station A-226 in the Death Star Owner's Technical Manual was actually a digitally-manipulated screenshot from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. Chris Trevas and Chris Reiff modified a picture of Vader and Tarkin facing a viewscreen so that they were looking at a view of the hyperspace tunnel.
